log.quotationOne: Очередной исследовательский центр… Впрочем, ничего нового быть не должно…
log.quotationTwo: “Но я не верю в эту вашу теорию о “Дите Хонкая”. ты же не можешь быть Херршером, ведь так?”
log.quotationThree: Итак… Мы решили дать тебе работу!”

log.quotationOne: “Вот так дела! Ну и как же этот старый пердун Эйнштейн поживает? Не начудил ли ещё чего на днях?”
log.quotationTwo: Мой дед однажды сказал: «Успех = гениальность + пот - пустая болтовня».”
log.quotationThree: “ⵥⵙⵎ ⵋⴱⴳ ⵐⵓⴽⴸ ⵐ ⵥⵛⵌⴱⴴⵙⴸ ⵋⵓⵖⴱ ⵥⴶ”

log.quotationOne: “… По правде я и сам не всё понял, но видимо мы отправляемся в америку…”
log.quotationTwo: “Не выдавать себя?… Стоп, Эти документы подделаны!? …”
log.quotationThree: “ЭЙ! Я к тебе обращаюсь! Хочешь сказать, что одной лишь коробки конфет достаточно, чтобы покорить тебя?!”

log.quotationOne: “Но бог ест шоколад.”
log.quotationTwo: “Разве это не просто устрицы?… Это не то, чего я не ела раньше. однако, они выглядят немного странно.”
log.quotationThree: «Лизерль такая милая девочка! — как старший брат, ты не должен терроризировать ее, а?”

log.quotationOne: “Пункт назначения: Йеллоустон — В путь!”
log.quotationTwo: “… Я не ожидал, что человеческая деятельность уже присутствовала в Северной Америке в эпоху Предыдущей Цивилизации.”
log.quotationThree: “Как вам такое? разве нам всем не повезло сегодня?”

log.quotationOne: “Ну подожди… Ты ещё увидишь! Я приложу все свои усилия!”
log.quotationTwo: “Для молодых, которые пришли сюда … Я оставляю вам последний Солиум!”
log.quotationThree: “Это просто некоторые… личные слова… между нами двумя…”

log.quotationOne: Всё только начинается.”
log.quotationTwo: “Я не ожидал, что такие исследователи, как вы, заинтересуются поврежденными картинами.”
log.quotationThree: “Чтобы предсказать судьбу человечества.” Эйнштейн сказала ледяным голосом, как никогда раньше.

log.quotationOne: “Do you wish to see him drown in his so-called ‘compassion’?”
log.quotationTwo: “Pale Death beats equally at the poor man's gate and at the palaces of kings.”
log.quotationThree: “You must also know that, the core belief of Schicksal, is to eradicate the Honkai from the face of the earth. But … unfortunately, this cannot be done.”

log.quotationOne: Just now he had received a letter, and it was a very strange letter indeed …
log.quotationTwo: “Welt! You stinky boy! If you have the courage, come and —”

log.quotationOne: “Ara ara … I'm just thinking that you're all being too serious right now, are you not?”
log.quotationTwo: “Did you forget about the ‘Herrscher’?”
log.quotationThree: “I will bring back Abyss Flower myself, in accordance with the plan. Over and out.”

log.quotationOne: “Hey l-little kiddo … y-you've got to help me! On behalf of all men!”
log.quotationTwo: “‘The Moonlight Throne Project’! What do you think of us using this name?”

log.quotationOne: “This month is already over, but we haven't been out of the city yet!”
log.quotationTwo: “ … Protect well, those who truly deserve your protection!”
log.quotationThree: “Welt … are you also familiar with this song?”

log.quotationOne: Everyone was probably thinking, “Anyway, there'll always be time in the future”.
“Wow! So sumptuous! I can't even tell which one's the main course!”
log.quotationTwo: “Wetting themselves with spit, how much better when they can forget themselves in the rivers and lakes.”
log.quotationThree: “Welt, this must be the first time you've seen such a clear starry sky.”

log.quotationOne: “No, in fact you didn't say anything wrong. But because of this ― it makes it even more … difficult to believe you, at this very moment.”
“I should sleep some more. Today could be a long day.”
log.quotationTwo: “It is about time I tell you my real name.”

log.quotationOne: “I hope I can leave them with a complete story”
“The butterfly fell on your fingertips. You fixed its wings.”
log.quotationTwo: “Are you awake? It seems that you have had a nightmare.”
log.quotationThree: “I don't want to deal with the government...”

log.quotationOne: “Nothing that really happens in the world can be as beautiful as the partial perception of a few senses.”
log.quotationTwo: “I am the Black Abyss that swallows everything, I am the white Flower that nurtures all.”

log.quotationOne: “With all the things we've done that he's going to resent, shouldn't we be on our guard?”
log.quotationTwo: “I do this all day long, I just want to be a catcher in the wheat field.”

log.quotationOne: “Out of the way. I'm looking for the boy in the back.”
“...It's okay. The teacher will focus on creating a surprise.”
log.quotationTwo: “What...This guy's a Herrscher. Isn't that obvious?”
log.quotationThree: “Bring it on! Let me witness what a Herrscher is capable of!”

log.quotationOne: “-- What nonsense, children!”
log.quotationTwo: “Uh...Wait, wait...The amount of information is a bit large...”
log.quotationThree: “Damn...There's no way to get the message out like this!”

log.quotationOne: “...It's not a priority right now, Nikola.”
log.quotationTwo: “...You talk too much, fool.”
log.quotationThree: “I will not allow you to defile this body with such impunity”

log.quotationOne: “In the face of any disaster, one can always find a stable future.”
log.quotationTwo: “Their brilliance cannot just be lost in darkness.”

log.quotationOne: “The world in eyes of Otto Apocalypse's was distorted.”
log.quotationTwo: “‘The Ship of Theseus’ was called by that name because of Theseus himself!”
